document.full_text: a handyman at a manhattan apartment building is suing his supervisor, claiming his boss called him a "midget," slapped him and pasted pictures of dwarfs on his locker, according to his court complaint.
document.title: new york handyman sues supervisor over height insults
lines_and_colors: a handyman at a manhattan apartment building is suing his supervisor, claiming his boss called him a "midget," slapped him and pasted pictures of dwarfs on his locker, according to his court complaint.
